OUTLINE : This randomize , open-label , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord duration prior tamoxifen therapy ( ≤ 2 year vs > 2 year ) ; time since tamoxifen therapy discontinue ( < 1 v ≥ 1 year ) ; prior adjuvant chemotherapy ( yes v ) ; baseline total lumbar spine femoral neck bone mineral density ( BMD ) T-score ( > -1 standard deviation [ SD ] v -1 -2 SD ) . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I ( immediate therapy ) : Patients receive oral letrozole daily . Patients also receive zoledronate IV 15 minute every 6 month . - Arm II ( delay therapy ) : Patients receive oral letrozole arm I . Patients radiologic evidence bone loss 1 year letrozole therapy receive zoledronate arm I . In arm , treatment continue 5 year absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity .
